thread.title: Can the Cleveland Cavaliers win the NBA championship without Tristan Thompson? (Video)
thread.title_full: Can the Cleveland Cavaliers win the NBA championship without Tristan Thompson? (Video) | cleveland.com

author: Chris Fedor, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: Can the Cleveland Cavaliers win the NBA championship without Tristan Thompson? (Video)
text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- Tristan Thompson remains a holdout as the Cleveland Cavaliers move closer to the regular season opener.
The contract stalemate has been going on since the summer and there doesn't appear to be any resolution coming soon. While the negotiations continue, a number of fans have taken the Cavs' side, calling Thompson selfish and questioning his value.
We asked our Cavs beat reporter, Chris Haynes, whether he thinks the Cavs could win a title without Thompson and how much of this back-and-forth is on the Cavs.
You can watch Sports Insider live every Thursday at noon at cleveland.com/sports .
